channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by ELABE for BFMTV and La Tribune Dimanche, 30–31 October 2025 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Parti socialiste–Place Publique (S&D): 7–10 seats
  • Lutte Ouvrière (*): 0 seats
  • Les Républicains (EPP): 0–7 seats
  • Reconquête (ESN): 0–6 seats
  • La France insoumise (GUE/NGL): 10–14 seats
  • Renaissance–Mouvement démocrate–Horizons (RE): 12–18 seats
  • Les Écologistes – Europe Écologie Les Verts (Greens/EFA): 0–6 seats
  • Parti communiste français (GUE/NGL): 0 seats
  • Rassemblement national (PfE): 32–39 seats
  • Debout la France (ECR): 0 seats
  • La France humaniste (*): 0–4 seats
